TopicTitle: Make a wish... and have it horribly corrupted!

Articles.Content:
Granted, you get a 1,000,000,000,000 ton bag of Gigantor Brand Mantis Shrimp Meal.

I wish for a universe sized black hole

005205122023

page, new

Edited May 12, 2023 by AlamoVampire

Granted. You see can the "Universal Pictures..." ... Oops. You can't.

I wish for entangled quantum computer..

Granted. I have the other one, so every time you use it to calculate difficult stuffs, your computer outputs game screenshots. 

I wish for a KSP hacking mod.

Granted. The hacking mod gives the kerbal sprites realistic coughing animation.

I wish for a window mounted heat pump.

Edited May 14, 2023 by Exploro

Granted. A self-propelled heat pump machine TMS-65 starts pumping heat into your window.

Spoiler

 


I wish there was its cooling analog.

Granted. And his name, Mr. Freeze. Mr Freeze be freez'n up your hood.

I wish for infinity G-2 pen refills.

Granted.  You have a supply of ink refills for the Infinity G-2 pen.  Unfortunately, there is no Infinity G-2 pen, which makes them useless.

I wish I could ice skate.

Granted you have ices called kate.

i wish i was able to change my form

211405152023

Granted. Please, change your forum name to AlamoBat(man).

I wish for a magic ancient artifact, just4lulz.

Granted. It is a cursed  toe ring which causes you to flatulate slightly louder than usual. 
 

I wish for a nice-tasting strawberry smoothie

Granted, it causes your flatulence to reach 80db and smell like strawberries. This effect is permanent. 
 

i wish to know if my corruption to the wish above my current post is corruption or not.

003805162023

Granted. You know it, but you can only live for another 10 minutes. 

I wish for instantly-complete homework.

Granted but you get an F.

I wish for a real rocket.

Granted. You are issued a party balloon and ordered to inflate it and then release it. Mundane?, yes. But a rocket it is.

I wish to stop having hallucinations while trying to sleep.

Granted. Once they have gotten real, they aren't hallucinations anymore.

I wish the Sun was solid..

Granted: But as the resulting reaction means no more heat and light, we all die too quickly to notice.

I wish people stopped creating things that could ruin life as we know it, just to prove how smart they are.

Granted in the process of doing this you blow up the sun and we all die 

I wish for the banning thread to be more calm @Gargamel

Granted: it remains calm and unchanging for days until you realise your computer has frozen.

I wish no taunting of those who can ban outside that thread.

Granted.

I wish that wish would have been harder to corrupt.

Granted. But now your wish is even harder to fulfill.

I wish for a week-long of twilight (no bright sunlight)...

Granted. You forgot to prepare the garlic and stakes.

I wish for an astral superarmor T-51b..

Granted the armour grabs you chokes you out

I wish for the super star destroyer Executor 

Edited May 19, 2023 by kspbutitscursed

Uhhh we dont serve that here sir

I want a ham burger.

Granted pig on bread 

I wish for starship

Here's New Glenn, you can get the second stage in 2 years

I wish for a mars colony
